projects.projectDescription: This website you are currently viewing, used as a first-port-of-call for people wanting to get to know me.
Project zeus is a Ai-driven realtime moderation bot used in live-chat systems like Discord.
BlueSky runs on a proof of concept ATP Social media site, this provides a custom algorithm that users can use to find posts they would enjoy.
Using a dedicated app and fullstack solution, we create an app that allows the client to contact and update their users information.
